quotes.quote: You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step. –
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: An important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Be the change you want to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: If you think you’re too small to be effective, you have never been in bed with a mosquito.
quotes.author: Betty Reese

quotes.quote: You can do something no one else can do in a fashion no one else can do it.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Put your heart, mind, intellect and soul even to your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
quotes.author: Swami Sivananda
